response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value and relevance to you, estimated at $15,000. Considering its high quality and the unique benefits it offers, I am extending to you a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you have the chance to secure this product at a price of $14,500. This is an extraordinary opportunity not only to save $500 but also to benefit from the unparalleled features and advantages this product provides. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14500}
